chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
y: pos n
x: pos n
Hxy: x <> y
i: nat
v: Vector.t (list bool) n
k: nat

Goal:
v#>x = list_repeat One k -> (i, increment i) // (i, v) ->> (15 + i, v[(list_repeat Zero (S k))/x])

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation One := true
Notation pos := Fin.t
Notation Zero := false
increment = fun i : nat => PUSH y Zero :: transfer_ones x y (1 + i) (5 + i) (10 + i) One ++ PUSH x One :: transfer_ones y x (6 + i) (15 + i) (15 + i) Zero ++ PUSH x Zero :: transfer_ones y x (11 + i) (15 + i) (15 + i) Zero ++ nil : nat -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments increment _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
list_repeat : forall X : Type, X -> nat -> list X
increment_spec_1 : forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat) (l : list bool), v#>x = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l -> (i, increment i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[(list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: l)/x])
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
transfer_ones_spec_1 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (b : bool) (k : nat) (l : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>x = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l -> st = (p, v[l/x][(list_repeat b k ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, transfer_ones x y i p q b) // (i, v) -> > st
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)
transfer_ones_spec_2 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (b : bool) (k : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>x = list_repeat One k -> st = (q, v[nil/x][(list_repeat b k ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, transfer_ones x y i p q b) // (i, v) -> > st
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
cs_spec_rec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (l m : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>y = m -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z) /\ (l = m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (p, w)) /\ (l <> m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (q, w))
empty_stack_spec : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), (i, empty_stack x i) // (i, v) -> > (3 + i, v[nil/x])
compare_stack_eq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
compare_stack_neq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x <> v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
tile_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (high low : list bool) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), st = (length (tile x y high low) + i, v[(high ++ v#>x)/x][(low ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, tile x y high low) // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
compare_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), exists (j : nat) (w : vec (list bool) n), (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (j, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z /\ (v#>x = v#>y /\ j = p \/ v#>x <> v#>y /\ j = q))
bsm_compute_POP_any : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_PUSH_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> {a : nat | a < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -[a] -> st}
bsm_compute_POP_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P // (p, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
bsm_compute_POP_E : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> P // (q, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_PUSH : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
half_tile_spec : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), (i, half_tile x l) // (i, v) -> > (length (half_tile x l) + i, v[(rev l ++ v#>x)/x])
bsm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
bsm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
Inductive bsm_sss (n : nat) : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n ->...-> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x]) | in_bsm_sss_push : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) Arguments bsm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_E [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_push [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
copy_rev_stack = fun (x y z : pos n) (i : nat) => let y' := y in POP x (5 + i) (9 + i) :: PUSH y One :: PUSH z One :: PUSH y' Zero :: POP y' i i :: PUSH y Zero :: PUSH z Zero :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments copy_rev_stack _ _ _ _%nat_scope
in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])
move_rev_stack = fun (x y : pos n) (i : nat) => let y' := y in POP x (4 + i) (7 + i) :: PUSH y One :: PUSH y' Zero :: POP y' i i :: PUSH y Zero :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments move_rev_stack _ _ _%nat_scope
in_bsm_sss_pop_E : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)
list_bool_choose_sym : forall lb : list bool, {k : nat & {tl : list bool | lb = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: tl}} + {k : nat | lb = list_repeat One k}
list_bool_choose : forall lb : list bool, {k : nat & {tl : list bool | lb = list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: tl}} + {k : nat | lb = list_repeat Zero k}
in_bsm_sss_push : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x])
list_One_Zero_inj : forall (a b : nat) (l m : list bool), list_repeat One a ++ Zero :: l = list_repeat One b ++ Zero :: m -> a = b /\ l = m
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat v : vec (list bool) n k : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v0 : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat v : vec (list bool) n k : nat |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat v : vec (list bool) n k : nat |- nat]
compare_stacks = fun (x y : pos n) (i p q : nat) => let x' := x in POP x (4 + i) (7 + i) :: POP y q q :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: POP y i q :: PUSH y Zero :: POP y q i :: POP y q p :: PUSH x' Zero :: POP x' q q :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> nat -> nat -> nat -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments compare_stacks _ _ (_ _ _)%nat_scope
list_One_Zero_not : forall (a b : nat) (l : list bool), list_repeat One a ++ Zero :: l <> list_repeat One b
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat v : vec (list bool) n k : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat v : vec (list bool) n k : nat |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat v : vec (list bool) n k : nat |- Type]

```  
intros.
intros H1 H2.
rewrite <- H1.
intros H3 H4.
split.
- rewrite H3.
  rewrite H2.
  auto.
- rewrite H4.
  auto.
```
